data.message: The whole company is always like we operate off giving value and the more you give the more you recieve but fk no they some theivin ass rude ass aholes. Also one time I asked Alex if he can recommend someone who can help me understand the benefits of medical marijuana and autistic kids and he said what do I look like a doctor use google... no shit asshole I just thought you offered value. Generally it is a good idea to become more humble with success not more cocky and believe you are better than everyone which is a dead ringer for a beta male.
